VRDisplayEvent.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The VRDisplayEvent interface of the WebVR API represents the event object of WebVR-related events (see the list of WebVR window extensions).

blockquote.para: This interface was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRDisplayEventDisplay.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The display read-only property of the interface returns the associated with this event.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRDisplayEventVRDisplayEvent.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The VRDisplayEvent() constructor creates a object.

blockquote.para: This constructor was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRDisplayEventReason.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The reason read-only property of the interface returns a human-readable reason why the event was fired.

blockquote.para: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

VRDisplayEventReason.value: A string representing the reason why the event was fired. The available reasons are defined in the VRDisplayEventReason enum, and are as follows:
